00029 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00030 {
00031     try
00032     {
00033         if (argc<2)
00034         {
00035             cout << "Usage: RawFileTest filename\n";
00036             return 1;
00037         }
00038         
00039         const char* filename = argv[1]; 
00040 
00041         RawFileLibrary rawFileLibrary;
00042 
00043         RawFilePtr rawfile(filename);
00044         rawfile->setCurrentController(Controller_MS, 1);
00045 
00046         cout << "name: " << rawfile->value(FileName) << endl;
00047         cout << "scanCount: " << rawfile->value(NumSpectra) << endl;
00048 
00049         return 0;
00050     }
00051     catch (RawEgg& egg)
00052     {
00053         cout << "Caught RawEgg: " << egg.error() << endl;
00054     }
00055     catch (exception& e)
00056     {
00057         cout << "Caught exception: " << e.what() << endl;
00058     }
00059     catch (...)
00060     {
00061         cout << "Caught unknown exception.\n";
00062     }
00063 
00064     return 1;
00065 }
